summary: Tested Advanced AI-Driven Procurement Handling feature for OMNISupply.io. All 12 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI verified - Landing page shows 4 options with AI Agent featured prominently at top, AI Agent page loads correctly with chat interface, all three intents (CATALOG_SEARCH, QUOTATION_ANALYSIS, MANAGED_SERVICES) work correctly, product results display with Add to Cart buttons, sidebar shows AI Procurement Agent with NEW badge.
passed_tests: Backend: AI Agent endpoint exists and accepts POST ✓
Backend: CATALOG_SEARCH intent with 'HP laptops' returns products ✓
Backend: CATALOG_SEARCH intent with 'Dell monitors' works ✓
Backend: QUOTATION_ANALYSIS intent classification works ✓
Backend: QUOTATION_ANALYSIS with 'benchmark' keyword works ✓
Backend: MANAGED_SERVICES intent with 'strategic sourcing' works ✓
Backend: MANAGED_SERVICES intent with 'RFP' keyword works ✓
Backend: Response includes engines_used (gpt, claude, gemini) ✓
Backend: Response message is not empty ✓
Backend: Context is preserved in response ✓
Backend: Product search returns valid structure ✓
Backend: Endpoint requires authentication ✓
Frontend: Landing page shows 4 options with AI Agent featured at top ✓
Frontend: AI Agent card has NEW badge and GPT-5.2 + Claude + Gemini badge ✓
Frontend: 'Start AI Conversation' button present ✓
Frontend: Browse Catalog, Upload Quotation, Sourcing Support cards present ✓
Frontend: AI Agent page loads at /ai-agent ✓
Frontend: AI Agent header shows 'Infosys AI Procurement Agent' ✓
Frontend: AI Agent shows 'Powered by GPT-5.2, Claude & Gemini' ✓
Frontend: Quick action buttons present (Find a Product, Find a Service, I have a Quotation, Complex/Strategic Sourcing) ✓
Frontend: Chat input field present ✓
Frontend: Product search 'I need HP laptops' returns 4 products with Add buttons ✓
Frontend: Quotation analysis intent guides to Upload Quotation page ✓
Frontend: Strategic sourcing intent shows Category Classification with UNSPSC code ✓
Frontend: Sidebar shows AI Procurement Agent with NEW badge ✓
Frontend: Sidebar shows AI Enabled Intelligent Buying with AI badge ✓
Frontend: Sidebar shows Managed Services with Buying Desk badge ✓
critical_code_review_comments: AI Agent endpoint (/api/ai-agent/conversation) is well-implemented with keyword-based fallback when LLM unavailable
Intent classification correctly routes to CATALOG_SEARCH, QUOTATION_ANALYSIS, or MANAGED_SERVICES
Product search returns relevant results with proper structure (id, name, price, currency, image_url)
UNSPSC code suggestion works for managed services intent
Frontend AIProcurementAgentPage.jsx properly handles all response types and displays product cards
Landing page correctly features AI Agent card at top with gradient styling and badges
seed_data_creation: No new seed data created. AI Agent uses existing IT_PRODUCTS_CATALOG and SERVICE_CATEGORIES from server.py

mocked_apis_list: AI classification uses keyword-based fallback when LLM unavailable (not mocked, just fallback logic)

context_for_next_testing_agent: AI Procurement Agent feature fully tested and working. The /api/ai-agent/conversation endpoint correctly classifies intents: CATALOG_SEARCH returns products, QUOTATION_ANALYSIS guides to upload page, MANAGED_SERVICES shows UNSPSC classification. Frontend chat interface works with product cards and Add to Cart buttons. Landing page has 4 options with AI Agent featured at top. Sidebar shows AI Procurement Agent with NEW badge.
